item.title: Who is using Go in enterprise?
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Who is using Go in enterprise? Technology Giants Google Created Go in 2007 Uses Go for many internal tools and services Examples: Kubernetes, Docker (partially) Reference: Go at Google: Language Design in the Service of Software Engineering

item.title: Go as an Enterprise Standard Language
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Go As Enterprise Standard Language What is An Enterprise standard language (From Java story)? Why Go? How to use Go in enterprise?

item.title: How to use Go in the Enterprise

item.description: How to use Go in enterprise? uber-go/guide Golang for enterprise application (Reddit) Golang Benefits and Best Practices for Highly Scalable App Development (Blog post)

item.title: When to use Go in the Enterprise

item.description: When to use Go in the Enterprise? Golang a programming language for modern enterprise applications (Blog post)

item.title: Why Enterprise Chose Java
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Why Java is chosen by enterprises Historical Context Initially developed by Sun Microsystems, Java was born out of an experimental project.

item.title: Why Go?
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Why Go Historical Context The Go programming language was developed at Google by Rob Pike, Robert Griesemer, and Ken Thompson.
